ygData.subject: RE: Rules and FAQ 3.4 - PLEASE READ THIS!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of Instruments, my guildmates got me a horn, but it s not really a horn per se. It is bard only and a horn graphic but it is only range equipable. It
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of Instruments, my guildmates got me a horn, but it's not really a
horn per se. It is bard only and a horn graphic but it is only range
equipable. It has a clickable slow and a load of awesome stats. I think it
dropped off something or other in VT. They logged me on to loot it so it
would not rot. They say it's effect doesn't stack with our slow song. I
haven't had a chance to test it yet. They also got the ancient mana song for
me. I have not had the time to play in the last couple weeks due to an
avalanche of RL stuff. Nothing bad, just loads of various crap that leaves
little time to play. I hope to get back in the swing when PoP comes out.

Also if you haven't heard, another nifty bard/rogue item drops in Fungus
Grove. It's a cloak that goes in the ammo slot with a rightclick self invis.
This is off the named guy that spawns when you do the ring, which is a ton
of fun btw and doable with a group. Just pick the right speed for your group
size/capability.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe 60 Bard
Brilinia Ilsidi 54
Brillinia Klagetsdautter 46 cleric
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
